front.title: Preliminary Evaluation of RFC 1652 for Advancement to Full Standard

abstract.t: This memo is a preliminary evaluation of RFC 1652 "SMTP Service Extension for 8bit-MIMEtransport" for advancement from Draft to Full Standard. It has been prepared by the The Yet Another Mail Working Group. THIS INTERNET DRAFT IS WRITTEN TO FACILITATE PROCESSING WITHIN THE IESG. IT IS NOT MEANT TO BE PUBLISHED AS AN RFC.
